ai-pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.5_0: If either of them, with their own body, makes physical contact with something connected to the other’s body, she commits a serious offense.

ai-pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.7_0: If a monk tickles another, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr2.16:1.8_0: These are the five conditions for the body. These are the five offenses he commits an offense entailing confession.
